articles.author: Jon Henley
articles.title: European region Covid cases jump 10% as WHO calls for Euro 2020 monitoring - The Guardian
articles.description: All eyes on Israel, as countries look to see if 85% vaccination rate will prevent more deaths during surge
articles.content: New Covid cases in the World Health Organizations 53-country European region rose 10% last week after falling for 10 straight weeks, the body has said, warning of a possible new surge before autumn a… [+3998 chars]

articles.author: CNA
articles.title: COVID-19 cases in Europe up again after 10 weeks of decline: WHO Europe - CNA
articles.description: COPENHAGEN: The World Health Organization (WHO) on Thursday (Jul 1) said COVID-19 cases were on the rise again in Europe after two months of decline and warned a new wave would come "unless we remain disciplined".
articles.content: COPENHAGEN: The World Health Organization (WHO) on Thursday (Jul 1) said COVID-19 cases were on the rise again in Europe after two months of decline and warned a new wave would come "unless we remain… [+1676 chars]
